_exec_summary.SummaryText:
A: Introduction

Kreisel CO is a supplier of fertilizer, agrichemicals, seed and other inputs to farmers. Bulk and packaged products are recived via transport trucks and stored for the eventual sale to farmers. This facility has an excellent saftly record with no injuries to plant personnel or contractors .



B: Accidental Release Prevention Policies and program

This facility strives to meet or exceed compliance with state anhydrous ammonia regulations. Training is provided to each new hire and all employees are retrained every year. The ammonia tank and accocated equipment are inspected annualy following recamended industry and engineering frequencies. Pressureized tanks and plumbing are tested according to the standards for the pressure vessel testing.



C: Emergency Responce

Each employee is trained to be familiar with emergency responce procedures through safety reviews and other safty meetings. Plant personel onsite in case of an emergency to assist local emergency personel.



D: Worse-Case Scenario / Alternative-Case Scenario

This facility has developed a worse-case and alternitive-case scenario however it has been withheld from this Executive Summary as security sensitive information as requested by the EPA.



E: Five Year Accident History

This facility has an excellent saftly record with no injuries to plant personnel or contractors . In addition there have been no acidents resulting in realeases of anhydrus ammonia with off-site consequences during the entire operating period. Extensive programs are in place to maintain this record.



F: Planned Changes to Improve Safety

Management at this plant continuously look for ways to enhance the safety of this loacation. Montly safety inspections are conducted which result in corrective actions. Annual equipment inspections are also conducted.



G: Summary

The employees of this company are extremely proud of our safety record and the community we live in. We belive with our programs and policies in place
and with the continued efforts of our personnel we will maintain our safety record and our safe facility enviroment for the public, our customers, and our employees for years to come.
